snippet: Britain’s three main political parties on Friday agreed on a plan to regulate the country’s newspapers, but the proposal faced heavy criticism from the press.
abstract: Britain’s three main political parties agree on plan to regulate country’s newspapers, but proposal faces heavy criticism from the press, casting doubt over its future.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s three main political parties on Friday agreed on a plan to regulate the country’s newspapers, but the proposal faced heavy criticism from the press.
